pr_title: Make ServerCnx, Producer and Consumer independent of Netty

timeline.message:
Make ServerCnx and Producer independent of Netty
* ServerCnx is changed into an interface for which PulsarServerCnx is an
implementation extending Netty's ChannelInboundHandlerAdapter
* Producer is changed into an abstract class with a PulsarProducer implementation
that sends the frames through the Pulsar bnary protocol

timeline.bodyText: why do you change it to the default method?
timeline.author: sijie

replies.bodyText: This way a protocol may or may not implement the method. For instance if some features are not yet supported. Also if new methods are added later, if they have default impl, it will not break dependant handlers.
replies.author: cbornet

replies.bodyText: I've set it back to non-default. We can see about the interest of default later.
replies.author: cbornet

timeline.bodyText: What is the main motivation for this change?
timeline.author: sijie

replies.bodyText: It's because protocol handlers may not have a ChannelHandlerContext to create a ChannelPromise from (eg. in gRPC you don't have direct access to the Netty channel).
